item.title: SAROSH KRISHAN
item.description:
Cell phone: +92-334-3266754

Email: saroshanish@gmail.com

Experience:

June 2020 – August 2020

Internship at TUKL Research Lab, NUST Islamabad

June 2019 – August 2019

Internship at Data Communication and Control (DCC), Karachi

Education:

Bachelor’s in Computer Science 2019 – Present
National University of Science and Technology (NUST)
Current CGPA: 3.90 (2 Semesters)

Projects:

• Created a failure of a chess bot, using the deep learning python library Keras, during the internship at TUKL in 2020.

• Team member for a side-scrolling 2D platformer, named SKARTA with original character design and gameplay features, in 2020.

• Team member for a fully functional chess game capable of user interaction from print statements in C, in 2019.

• Team member for a line following robot using LDRs and an Arduino circuit, during the internship at DCC in 2018.

Computer Related Skills:

• Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).
• Python.
• Java.
• C++.

Hobbies & Interests:

• Chess
• Rubik’s Cubes
• Video Games
• Writing and Poetry
• Music (Piano, Guitar, Ukulele)
• Table Tennis
• Coin Collection
• Making People Laugh

Professional Strengths:

• Good presentation skills and leadership qualities.
• Punctual, flexible, and adaptable.
• Dedicated and hard working.
